item.title: Upcoming strike
item.description: On Friday, 20 June there may be service disruptions due to a general strike. However, this will not affect the following services: final exams for Bachelor‚Äôs and Master‚Äôs degrees, postgraduate schools and PhD programmes, issuing of urgent certificates.%0A

item.title: Maker Faire Rome: applications open until June 23, 2025
item.description: Applications are now open for Maker Faire Rome, the exhibition that celebrates the most innovative projects from public universities and research institutes.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Virgilio Program 2025/26: Ranking list
item.description: The Selection Committee for the Virgilio Program 2025-26 gathered on May 15th 2025 at 12.30 am to screen applications and select applicants. item.title: Dual Career programme for student-athletes
item.description: As of 15 July 2025, students can submit their application for the Dual Career programme, aimed at supporting high-level athletes in balancing their competitive sports commitments with university career.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
